template.s_title: {WEB_TITLE} - Ktoś ma pytanie dotyczące Twojego ogłoszenia
template.s_description:
Witaj {CONTACT_NAME}!

{USER_NAME} ({USER_EMAIL}, {USER_PHONE}) zostawił Ci wiadomość z tym ogłoszeniem {ITEM_TITLE}:

{COMMENT}

Pozdrowienia,

{WEB_LINK}

Witaj {USER_NAME},

Potwierdź swoją rejestrację klikając na poniższy link: {VALIDATION_LINK}

Dziękujemy!

Pozdrowienia,

{WEB_LINK}

Hi {USER_NAME},

You've successfully registered for {WEB_LINK}.

Thank you!

Regards,

{WEB_LINK}

Witaj {FRIEND_NAME},

Twój znajomy {USER_NAME} przesyła Ci ogłoszenie, które może Cię zainteresować{ITEM_TITLE}.

Wiadomość:

{COMMENT}

Pozdrawiam,

{WEB_TITLE}

template.s_title: {WEB_TITLE} - Nowe ogłoszenie in the last hour
template.s_description:
Witaj {USER_NAME},

W ostatniej godzinie opublikowano nowe ogłoszenia. Sprawdź je!

{ADS}

-------------

Jeśli nie chcesz otrzymywać tych wiadomości, kliknij ten link:{UNSUB_LINK}

{WEB_LINK}

template.s_title: {WEB_TITLE} - Nowe ogłoszenie in the last day
template.s_description:
Witaj {USER_NAME},

W ostatnim dniu opublikowano nowe ogłoszenia. Sprawdź je!

{ADS}

-------------

Jeśli nie chcesz otrzymywać tych wiadomości, kliknij ten link:{UNSUB_LINK}

{WEB_LINK}

template.s_title: {WEB_TITLE} - Nowe ogłoszenie in the last week
template.s_description:
Witaj {USER_NAME},

Nowe ogłoszenie opublikowane w ubiegłym tygodniu. Sprawdź je:

{ADS}

-------------

Jeśli nie chcesz otrzymywać tych wiadomości, kliknij ten link:: {UNSUB_LINK}

{WEB_LINK}

Witaj {USER_NAME},

Opublikowane nowe ogłoszenie, sprawdź je!

{ADS}

-------------

Jeśli nie chcesz otrzymywać tych wiadomości, kliknij ten link: {UNSUB_LINK}

{WEB_LINK}

Someone commented on the listing {ITEM_TITLE}.

Commenter: {COMMENT_AUTHOR}
Commenter's email: {COMMENT_EMAIL}
Title: {COMMENT_TITLE}
Comment: {COMMENT_TEXT}

Hi {USER_NAME},

You're not registered at {WEB_LINK}, but you can still edit or delete the listing {ITEM_TITLE} for a short period of time.

You can edit your listing by following this link: {EDIT_LINK}

You can delete your listing by following this link: {DELETE_LINK}

If you register as a user, you will have full access to editing options.

Regards,

{WEB_LINK}

Hi {USER_NAME},

You're receiving this e-mail because a listing has been published at {WEB_LINK}. Please validate this listing by clicking on the following link: {VALIDATION_LINK}. If you didn't publish this listing, please ignore this email.

Listing details:

Contact name: {USER_NAME}
Contact e-mail: {USER_EMAIL}

{ITEM_DESCRIPTION}

Url: {ITEM_URL}

Regards,

{WEB_LINK}

Dear {WEB_TITLE} admin,

You're receiving this email because a listing has been published at {WEB_LINK}.

Listing details:

Contact name: {USER_NAME}
Contact email: {USER_EMAIL}

{ITEM_DESCRIPTION}

Url: {ITEM_URL}

You can edit this listing by clicking on the following link: {EDIT_LINK}

Regards,

{WEB_LINK}

Hi {USER_NAME},

We've sent you this e-mail because you've requested a password reminder. Follow this link to recover it: {PASSWORD_LINK}

The link will be deactivated in 24 hours.

If you didn't request a password reminder, please ignore this message. This request was made from IP {IP_ADDRESS} on {DATE_TIME}

Regards,

{WEB_LINK}

Hi {USER_NAME}

You're receiving this e-mail because you requested an e-mail change. Please confirm this new e-mail address by clicking on the following validation link: {VALIDATION_LINK}

Regards,

{WEB_LINK}

Witaj {USER_NAME},

Kliknij na podany link, aby otrzymywać powiadomienia: {VALIDATION_LINK}

Dziękujemy!

Pozdrowienia,

{WEB_LINK}

Witaj {COMMENT_AUTHOR},

Twój komentarz dotyczący{ITEM_TITLE}został zatwierdzony

Pozdrowienia,

{WEB_LINK}

Hi {USER_NAME},

You're receiving this e-mail because you’ve published a listing at {WEB_LINK}. Please validate this listing by clicking on the following link: {VALIDATION_LINK}. If you didn't publish this listing, please ignore this e-mail.

Listing details:

Contact name: {USER_NAME}
Contact e-mail: {USER_EMAIL}

{ITEM_DESCRIPTION}

Url: {ITEM_URL}

Even if you're not registered at {WEB_LINK}, you can still edit or delete your listing:

You can edit your listing by following this link: {EDIT_LINK}

You can delete your listing by following this link: {DELETE_LINK}

Regards,

{WEB_LINK}

Dear {WEB_TITLE} admin,

You're receiving this email because a new user has been created at {WEB_LINK}.

User details:

Name: {USER_NAME}
E-mail: {USER_EMAIL}

Regards,

{WEB_LINK}

template.s_title: {WEB_TITLE} - Ktoś ma pytanie dotyczące Twojego ogłoszenia
template.s_description:
Witaj {CONTACT_NAME}!

{USER_NAME} ({USER_EMAIL}, {USER_PHONE}) zostawił Ci wiadomość:

{COMMENT}

Pozdrowienia,

{WEB_LINK}

There's a new comment on the listing: {ITEM_TITLE}.

Author: {COMMENT_AUTHOR}
Author's email: {COMMENT_EMAIL}
Title: {COMMENT_TITLE}
Comment: {COMMENT_TEXT}

{WEB_LINK}

Witaj {ADMIN_NAME},

  • Użytkownik: {USERNAME}
  • Hasło: {PASSWORD}

Możesz zalogować się do panelu użytkownika tutaj {WEB_ADMIN_LINK}.

Twoje ogłoszenie {ITEM_TITLE}niedługo wygaśnie {WEB_LINK}.
